ComicInfo.Summary:
Danger is everywhere, even in the air! Outgunned and outmanned, Dejah Thoris and the crew of the Xataxian battle the legendary Black Pirates of Barsoom.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Diego Galindo | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike McKone | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Diego Galindo | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 6 |
